lead_paragraph: A Sports of The Times column in some editions on Saturday, about the performance by Michael Phelps in the 100-meter butterfly to win his seventh swimming gold medal at the Beijing Olympics, misstated the timing of the race. It was on Saturday morning in Beijing, not Friday morning.
